name: I Got Your Back
description: After Noelle uses a Normal Attack: If this card and Full Plate are both still in play, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: After <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1602] uses a Normal Attack:</color> If this card and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116021]</color> are both still in play, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: After <color=#FFFFFFFF>Noelle uses a Normal Attack:</color> If this card and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Full Plate</color> are both still in play, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
